data.comment: The match is underway in Puebla.
Free kick Toluca.
In the minute 4, Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 6, In Puebla Puebla's Javier Salas is caught offside.
Puebla are coming forward and Santiago Ormeno gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 7, William da Silva gets his shot on target but fails to score for Toluca.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
In the minute 12, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Toluca have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
In the minute 15, Diego Gonzalez of Toluca gets in a strike, but is off target.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Puebla a goal kick.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 19, Puebla needs to be cautious. Toluca have an attacking throw-in.
Toluca move into a 0-1 lead through a William da Silva header.
Raul Lopez instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Puebla pushes forward through Pablo Gonzalez Diaz, whose finish on goal is saved.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto waits before resuming play because Enrique Triverio for Toluca is still down.
In the minute 23, Enrique Triverio is back on the pitch.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Toluca throw-in in Puebla's half.
Michael Estrada of Toluca smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 24, Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Pablo Gonzalez Diaz for Puebla who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in Puebla.
In the minute 26, Pablo Gonzalez Diaz has recovered and rejoins the match in Puebla.
Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 27, Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Michael Estrada for Toluca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Toluca.
Santiago Ormeno grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Toluca.
Toluca will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Puebla.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Puebla.
In the minute 35, Toluca's Rubens Sambueza has been booked in Puebla.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Puebla a goal kick.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Toluca.
Puebla to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Puebla throw-in in Toluca's half.
In the minute 40, At Estadio Cuauhtemoc, Daniel Alvarez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Daniel Alvarez is on target to give Puebla a 2-1 advantage.
William da Silva for Toluca drives towards goal at Estadio Cuauhtemoc. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 42, Toluca have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Toluca's Javier Guemez breaks free at Estadio Cuauhtemoc. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 43, Puebla have a goal kick.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Daniel Alvarez is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Toluca.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Puebla close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Daniel Alvarez is back on his feet again.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 47, Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Toluca to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Toluca close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
Puebla's Maximiliano Perg misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Toluca.
Free kick for Toluca in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 54, Can Toluca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In Puebla Puebla attack through Omar Fernandez. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 56, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Toluca a goal kick.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Puebla.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 58, Toluca have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Puebla just outside Toluca's area.
William da Silva (Toluca) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 60, Puebla's Santiago Ormeno is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
Free kick for Toluca in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 62, Toluca drives forward and Rubens Sambueza gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in high up the field for Puebla in Puebla.
Toluca make their first substitution with Kevin Castaneda replacing Alan Medina.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Toluca throw-in in Puebla's half.
Can Toluca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Puebla's half?
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
Throw-in Toluca.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Toluca.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the away team in Puebla.
Amaury Escoto is replacing Santiago Ormeno for the home team.
Alejandro Chumacero is on a sub for Daniel Alvarez for Puebla.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Puebla are pushing forward but Pablo Gonzalez Diaz's finish is wide of the goal.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
In the minute 75, Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Toluca to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
The away team replace Diego Gonzalez with Joao Plata.
In Puebla Toluca drive forward through Joao Plata. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
In the minute 81, Goal! Pablo Gonzalez Diaz extends Puebla's lead to 3-1.
Great play from Omar Fernandez to set up the goal.
Jose Manuel De la Torre (Toluca) is making a third substitution, with Diego Abella replacing Michael Estrada.
In the minute 82, The home team have replaced Omar Fernandez with Osvaldo Martinez. This is the third substitution made today by Juan Reynoso.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
That's full-time at Estadio Cuauhtemoc. The final score is 4-1.
Great finish from Amaury Escoto to give Puebla a 4-1 lead.
